Headline: Loop- bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop- bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Francisco. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop- bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Francisco. 

Shuttle buses are available from Kimball to Belmont to provide connecting service until 9:00am

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #44 Wallace-Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/84th
ShortDescription: #44 Wallace-Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 79th, Loomis, 87th, and Racine, due to street blockage near Racine/84th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace-Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 79th, Loomis, 87th, and Racine then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Racine/84th.

Allow extra travel time.
